title: Homepage banner autoplay enablement and copy update to remove 'delivery'

requirements.summary: Enable homepage banner carousel autoplay by default when 2+ banners exist, preserving pause-on-interaction and manual navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, when `siteMedia.banners.length >= 2`, the banner advances automatically on a timer without requiring user input.
Carousel autoplay is not paused by default on initial page load.
Manual navigation (previous/next buttons and dots) continues to work and does not break autoplay.
When the user interacts (hover/focus) the carousel pauses, and it resumes afterward (current behavior preserved).

file_operations.description: Adjust carousel pause/autoplay logic to ensure autoplay runs by default when there are 2+ banners, and expand interaction pausing to reliably cover hover, focus-within, and touch/pointer interactions while keeping existing next/previous buttons and dot navigation working alongside autoplay.

requirements.summary: Remove 'delivery' wording from all user-facing copy and replace with service-appropriate English phrasing ('on-time service'/'on-time setup').
acceptanceCriteria: No user-facing text anywhere in the frontend contains the word "delivery" (case-insensitive).
The homepage "Why Choose Us" section replaces the phrase "on-time delivery" with "on-time service" (or "on-time setup") while keeping the sentence grammatically correct.
All updated text remains in English and matches the existing marketing tone.

file_operations.description: Update the homepage 'Why Choose Us' copy to replace 'on-time delivery' with service-appropriate wording (e.g., 'on-time service' and/or 'on-time setup') and ensure no remaining user-facing 'delivery' text remains in this view.
